content: Introduction Pokemon Tower Defense is a project that i started because i was playing the original game alot but the servers happened to go down. I wanted to challenge myself to make this game with SFML a multimedia library which i didn’t have much knowledge of at the time.
title: Pokemon Tower Defense

content: What I learned I learned a lot about memory management in this project what to look out for, what to do and what NOT to do. Learned a lot about loading textures, levels and data into memory and unloading it after it is not needed anymore. Working with SQLite database creating, reading and saving data.
title: Pokemon Tower Defense

content: :) This is a very old project where I made a Fortnite clone using unreal engine with mostly blueprints. At the time I really wanted to recreate the building mechanics that Fortnite had. In the process of making this game I learned a lot about: Data structures Blueprints Replication This is quite an old project so I don’t have much to say about it anymore but I am proud of the end result.
title: Fortnite clone
